General.Name: Marti Otel Isletmeleri AS
General.Description: Marti Otel Isletmeleri A.S. operates and leases hotels, motels, holiday villages, marinas, restaurants, and other touristic facilities in Turkey. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
